name: Ice Fang
description: You attempt to pierce a creature with ice- infused fangs. Make a melee attack, dealing 1d10 + MOVE ice damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 19 or 20, the target is frozen and flinches.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
